definition: a message written in a secret code, to make a mathematical calculation or computation
details:
noun
- a message written in a secret code
= example: a message written in a secret code
= synonyms:
- a secret method of writing
= example: a secret method of writing
= synonyms: cryptograph
- a person of no influence
= example: a person of no influence
= synonyms: , nobody, nonentity
- a quantity of no importance
= synonyms: nothing
- a mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number
= example: a mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number
= synonyms: zero
verb
- to make a mathematical calculation or computation
= example: to make a mathematical calculation or computation
= synonyms: figure
- to convert ordinary language into code
= example: to convert ordinary language into code
= synonyms: code, inscribe, encipher, encrypt, write in code
